# Packages which have version in both environments
#   I am choosing to install versions from production environment.
#   Development: 
# unicodecsv==0.14.1
# html5lib==0.95
#   Production:
unicodecsv==0.9.4
html5lib==0.90

# On production: 0.8.1c, but this version has problems with installation
vobject==0.8.2

# On production: 1.45, but this version is no longer available
